snippet.title: Fade: A Ghost Story - full walkthrough
snippet.description:
A full video of the short game I made in a week for the GJL Game Parade Spring 2021. 'Fade - A Ghost Story' is the story of a ghost who travels back through time to try and get back it's lost memories. It's also the first game I've made, so any comments or feedback would be greatly appreciated.

The game can be played here: https://commandershizzle.itch.io/fade-a-ghost-story

PLEASE NOTE: this version has a bug in it on level 5 (Halloween), but I will be uploading a new, fixed version when voting for the Jam finishes next week.

Thanks, and hope you enjoy!
